hero.title: Shape Your Perfect
hero.subtitle: Discover cutting-edge dentistry in a comfortable and friendly environment. Your smile is our passion.

services.title: Comprehensive Dental Care
services.subtitle: We offer a complete range of dental services to meet all your family's needs.

general_checkups.title: General Checkups
general_checkups.description: Routine cleanings and examinations to maintain optimal oral health and prevent future problems.

dental_implants.title: Dental Implants
dental_implants.description: A permanent and natural-looking solution to replace missing teeth and restore your smile.

emergency.title: Emergency Care
emergency.description: 24/7 emergency dental services for urgent dental needs and pain relief.

about.title: Meet Our Expert Team
about.description1: At Golden Smile, our strength lies in our dedicated and compassionate team. Led by our expert dentists, we are committed to providing personalized care using the latest dental technologies.
about.description2: We believe in building lasting relationships with our patients, based on trust and open communication. Your comfort and health are our top priorities.

testimonials.title: What Our Patients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Don't just take our word for it - hear from our satisfied patients about their experience at Golden Smile Dental.

testimonial1.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonial1.title: Dental Implant Patient
testimonial1.quote: Dr. Smith and his team provided exceptional care. My smile has never looked better!

testimonial2.name: Michael Chen
testimonial2.title: General Checkup Patient
testimonial2.quote: Professional, friendly, and pain-free experience. Highly recommend Golden Smile Dental!

testimonial3.name: Emily Rodriguez
testimonial3.title: Cosmetic Dentistry Patient
testimonial3.quote: Amazing results! The teeth whitening procedure was quick and the results exceeded my expectations.

testimonial4.name: David Thompson
testimonial4.title: Orthodontic Patient
testimonial4.quote: The braces treatment was comfortable and the staff made every visit pleasant. Perfect results!

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Ready to schedule your appointment? Get in touch with us today!

form.title: Send us a Message

success.title: Message Sent Successfully!
success.description: We'll get back to you within 24 hours.

footer.tagline: Your trusted partner for exceptional dental care and beautiful smiles.
